about_the_game:
Welcome to Nerd Space.

Nerd Space is a death match survival game that picks one survivor from 4 or less
Win the game by competing each other's luck and skills on different concept maps.
When you're done with the round, either select a weapon or change that weapon's capability to prepare you to win the next round.
Various weapons and maps are waiting for you.


Competition, survival

Prepare for battle to win various randomly selected maps,
Avoid obstacles that hinder your survival or use obstacles to win over your opponent
Also, use the tools to favor survival in emergency situations or the right circumstances to defeat your opponents and become the last person to win


The ability to evolve

After the round, change the weapon so that you can win the next round, or change the capability of the weapon you are equipped with.
There are many types of weapons, and there are also weapons that can turn things around.
If you're not changing your weapon, you can change your weapon's capabilities. You can change your weapon's capabilities by changing its firing speed, increasing its damage, and so on
Secure what you lacked in the last round and become the final winner of the round

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
